attributes.action: turn the Olympic Village into MP and affordable housing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Olympic Village is a taxpayer (£5.3Bn) funded new build prime location site with 17,000 beds . It has it's own security perimiter, and transport links to the centre, making it ideal for MP's accomodation from out of London. There would be provision for services (taxi, cleaner etc) 'on site' thereby creating jobs and removing some MP's expenses.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
